parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector that specifies the direction of the ordinate dimension

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line start point

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line end point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector and specifies the orientation of the text; for example, (1, 0, 0) results in horizontal text read from left to right

parameters.name: P5
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians (character slant)

title: IDrawingDoc.ICreateOrdinateDim4
signature:
DisplayDimension ICreateOrdinateDim4( 
   ref System.Double
P0
,
   ref System.Double
P1
,
   ref System.Double
P2
,
   ref System.Double
P3
,
   ref System.Double
P4
,
   ref System.Double
P5
,
   System.Double
Val
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Double
TextHeight
)

parameters.name: P0
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); dimension point

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector that specifies the direction of the ordinate dimension

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line start point

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line end point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector and specifies the orientation of the text; for example, (1, 0, 0) results in horizontal text read from left to right

parameters.name: P5
parameters.description: Pointer to an array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians (character slant)

remarks: SOLIDWORKS creates this type of dimension between the two points you specify. It has no relation to your geometry.
